property.name: Interfaces
property.tp:docstring: A list of the extra interfaces provided by this channel dispatcher.

property.name: Dispatch_Operations
property.tp:docstring: The list of ChannelDispatch objects currently being processed. Change notification is via the NewDispatch and DispatchFinished signals.
